_comment: Job Hunter OS Scoring Algorithm Configuration Reference
_description: Complete reference for job fit scoring weights, thresholds, and criteria. Used by scoring-engine.js. Modify values here to tune algorithm behavior.

overview.purpose: Bidirectional scoring for job fit evaluation (0-100 overall)
dimensions: Job→User Fit (0-50): Does job meet user's requirements?
User→Job Fit (0-50): Does user match job requirements?
Overall Score (0-100): Combined probability of mutual fit

job_to_user_fit.description: Evaluates whether job meets user's preferences, salary floor, workplace requirements

dimensions.name: salary
dimensions.description: Base salary vs. user's floor and target
dimensions.logic: If below floor: penalized. If at target: 50. If exceeds target by 20%+: bonus.

dimensions.name: workplace
dimensions.logic: Perfect match (remote-first user + remote job): 50. Hybrid: 35. On-site: 0-20 depending on requirement.

dimensions.name: equity
dimensions.logic: If equity+bonus: 50. If either: 30-40. If neither: 0-20 depending on user's preference.

dimensions.name: company_stage
dimensions.description: Company maturity (seed, Series B, late-stage, IPO)
dimensions.logic: Lookup stage in config table. Series B+ gets bonus if it's a must-have.

dimensions.name: deal_breaker_check
dimensions.description: Hard pass filters (if ANY match, overall score = 0 immediately)
dimensions.logic: If breaker triggered: auto-fail with score 0. Else: pass with score 50.

job_to_user_fit.weighted_average_calculation: Sum(score * weight for each dimension) → capped at 50

user_to_job_fit.description: Evaluates whether user's background, skills, and experience match job requirements

dimensions.name: role_type
dimensions.description: Job title alignment with user's target roles
dimensions.logic: Exact match: 50. Contains keywords (growth, revops, cro): 40. Director/Head/VP level: 35. Manager/Lead: 25. Other: 15.
examples: Senior Director, Growth Strategy → contains keyword + seniority
Manager, Sales Operations → below target seniority

dimensions.name: revops_component
dimensions.description: Estimated percentage of role focused on RevOps vs. other responsibilities
dimensions.logic: Count RevOps keywords in job description. 40%+: 50. 20-39%: 35. 5-19%: 20. <5%: 10.

dimensions.name: skill_match
dimensions.description: Percentage of user's core skills mentioned in job description

dimensions.name: industry_alignment
dimensions.description: User's industry experience vs. job's industry

dimensions.name: org_complexity
dimensions.logic: Critical inflection/new leadership: 30. High growth: 40. Stable growth: 45.
signals_of_complexity: Recent major leadership hires (CRO, COO, CFO)

user_to_job_fit.weighted_average_calculation: Sum(score * weight for each dimension) → capped at 50

overall_score_calculation.formula: Job→User Fit (0-50) + User→Job Fit (0-50) = Overall Score (0-100)

deal_breaker_triggers.description: If ANY of these conditions match, job auto-fails (score 0)

no_equity.rationale: Equity is required component of offer

pre_revenue.rationale: Too early stage for Matt's stage preferences

no_revops_component.trigger: revops keyword count = 0 in job description
no_revops_component.override: Can be overridden if organization is exceptional (Series D+, $100M+ ARR)

must_haves.description: Jobs matching 2+ of these get a scoring boost in Job→User dimension

tuning_guide.to_be_stricter: Increase deal-breaker list; increase weight on revops_component
tuning_guide.to_be_lenient: Remove deal-breakers; decrease salary floor; reduce revops_component weight
tuning_guide.to_prioritize_skill_match: Increase skill_match weight in User→Job Fit
